about.title: About
about.intro: ðŸ‘‹ Hey! I'm Young, an AI product consultant based in Taiwan
about.brandStatement: I transform scattered conversations, fragmented knowledge, and fleeting inspiration into stable, repeatable, and evolvable systems
about.paragraph1: I spent the last 10+ years building products in EdTech, e-commerce, and NPO sectors. Recently, I've been transferring this expertise to healthcare with great successâ€”leading teams, shipping features that hundreds of thousands of users rely on, and solving real business problems with AI
about.paragraph2: My journey started in education technology, where I built products like Vaitor, Jutor, and Cutor that helped students learn more effectively. I led engineering teams, scaled products from prototype to production, and learned how to translate AI capabilities into tangible business outcomes
about.paragraph3: Now I help organizations navigate AI transformationâ€”from strategy to deployment. I work with companies that are serious about building AI products that drive measurable impact, not just experimenting with the latest hype
about.paragraph4: When I'm not building products, you'll find me writing on Medium about AI product development, speaking at tech conferences, or mentoring the next generation of technical leaders

savings.description: Built a data dashboard that replaced expensive external analytics tools at a major EdTech platform. Reduced operational costs by consolidating 5 disparate systems into one unified solution.

growth.description: Led AI product initiatives that grew monthly active users from 200K to 300K+ within 12 months. Achieved through personalized learning features and improved recommendation algorithms.

retention.description: Maintained exceptionally low team attrition while scaling engineering organization from 8 to 25+ members. Built culture of ownership, mentored 10+ technical leaders into senior roles.

product.title: AI Product Development
product.pain: Building an English learning platform is time-consuming and expensive. Outsourcing requires extensive communication, detailed specs for pricing, and long waitsâ€”1 month at best, a quarter at worst
product.solution: Direct on-site collaboration, proposal review on day 1, interactive prototype delivered in week 1
product.value: Typically live with users within a month, saving time and communication costs
product.note: $1,500-3,000/hour or Starting at $50,000 â€¢ Typical MVP: 3-6 weeks

strategy.title: AI Strategy Consulting
strategy.pain: Organization uses multiple expensive analytics tools, data scattered everywhere, hard to get unified insights for decision-making
strategy.solution: Design unified data architecture, integrate existing systems, build one-stop analytics platform
strategy.value: Eliminate at least 3 enterprise software subscriptions, centralized data management, real-time insights for decisions

consulting.title: AI Adoption & Training
consulting.pain: Need to adopt new tools, upskill talent, and transform management thinking to leverage AI automation, but don't know where to start
consulting.solution: From basics to advanced applications, phased implementation that lets teams gradually adapt and internalize
consulting.value: Teams actually use AI tools effectively, reducing learning curve and adoption resistance
consulting.note: $5,000-8,000 per half-day â€¢ $8,000-15,000 per full-day workshop

gallery.title: Portfolio
gallery.subtitle: Selected projects showcasing AI product development, data infrastructure, and EdTech innovation

vaitorDetail.description:
Vaitor is an adaptive learning platform that revolutionized personalized education for 300,000+ students. By combining natural language processing with intelligent recommendation algorithms, we created a system that understands each student's learning patterns and adapts content in real-time.

The platform analyzes student interactions, performance data, and learning behavior to deliver personalized content paths. Our AI tutoring features provide instant feedback, identify knowledge gaps, and suggest targeted interventions that improved learning outcomes by 40%.
vaitorDetail.feature1: Adaptive learning paths based on individual student performance
vaitorDetail.result1: Grew active user base from 200K to 300K+ within 12 months
vaitorDetail.result2: Achieved 40% improvement in learning outcomes through personalized content
vaitorDetail.result3: Successfully scaled engineering team from 3 to 15 members
vaitorDetail.result4: Maintained <5% team turnover while scaling organization

healthcareDetail.description:
Built a comprehensive analytics platform that replaced 5 disparate external tools, saving $1.2M annually. This unified solution provides real-time insights for clinical decision support and operational intelligence.

The platform consolidates data from multiple sources into a single, coherent dashboard. Healthcare professionals can access real-time patient data, track clinical outcomes, and make data-driven decisions that improve patient care while reducing operational costs.
healthcareDetail.feature1: Unified dashboard consolidating 5 separate analytics systems
healthcareDetail.result1: Saved $1.2M annually by eliminating external tool dependencies
healthcareDetail.result2: Reduced data query time from hours to seconds
healthcareDetail.result3: Consolidated 5 systems into one unified platform
healthcareDetail.result4: Improved clinical decision-making with real-time insights

jutorDetail.description:
Developed a comprehensive AI tutoring suite consisting of Jutor (English learning) and Cutor (Chinese writing). These platforms leverage advanced AI to provide personalized feedback, adaptive practice, and intelligent assessment for language learners.

Jutor focuses on all four language skills - listening, speaking, reading, and writing - with real-time pronunciation analysis and grammar correction. Cutor specializes in Chinese essay writing and correction, helping students improve their composition skills through AI-powered feedback.
jutorDetail.feature1: Multi-skill English learning (listening, speaking, reading, writing)
jutorDetail.feature4: Adaptive difficulty based on student performance
jutorDetail.result4: Top 8 finalist in Meta LLM Taiwan Pitch

learningRecommendationDetail.description:
Built a sophisticated recommendation engine that transforms how students discover and engage with learning content. By analyzing millions of data points including performance metrics, learning pace, interaction patterns, and knowledge gaps, the system delivers hyper-personalized content recommendations in real-time.

The engine employs collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and deep learning models to predict optimal learning pathways for each student. This results in significantly improved engagement rates and faster skill mastery compared to traditional one-size-fits-all approaches.
learningRecommendationDetail.feature1: Real-time personalization based on learning behavior
learningRecommendationDetail.feature3: Collaborative filtering for similar learner patterns
learningRecommendationDetail.feature4: A/B testing framework for continuous optimization
learningRecommendationDetail.feature5: Scalable architecture handling millions of recommendations daily
learningRecommendationDetail.result3: Reduced time to skill mastery by 70%
learningRecommendationDetail.result4: Supported diverse learning styles with 92% accuracy

assessmentPlatformDetail.description:
Created a next-generation assessment platform that reimagines how educators evaluate student learning. The platform combines adaptive testing algorithms with AI-powered auto-grading to deliver fair, efficient, and insightful assessments at scale.

Key innovations include intelligent question generation, plagiarism detection using NLP, automated partial credit scoring for complex responses, and real-time learning gap identification. The platform helps educators focus on teaching rather than administrative grading tasks.
assessmentPlatformDetail.feature1: Adaptive test generation based on student proficiency
assessmentPlatformDetail.feature2: AI-powered auto-grading for essays and open-ended questions
assessmentPlatformDetail.feature4: Learning gap analysis and intervention recommendations
assessmentPlatformDetail.result2: Reduced grading time by 90% for educators

contentManagementDetail.description:
Developed a comprehensive content management system specifically designed for educational institutions. The platform enables educators to create, curate, organize, and distribute learning materials efficiently while maintaining quality and consistency across multiple languages and formats.

Built-in AI features analyze content quality, suggest improvements, and automatically tag and categorize materials. Version control ensures educators can track changes and revert when needed, while multi-language support enables global content distribution.
contentManagementDetail.feature1: Intuitive content creation and editing interface
contentManagementDetail.feature2: AI-powered content quality analysis and suggestions
contentManagementDetail.feature3: Multi-language support with automatic translation workflows
contentManagementDetail.feature4: Advanced version control and collaboration tools

dataAnalyticsDetail.description:
Designed and built a comprehensive data analytics suite tailored for educational institutions. This platform consolidates data from multiple sources to provide real-time insights into student performance, curriculum effectiveness, teacher productivity, and operational metrics.

The system replaced multiple expensive legacy analytics tools, saving $800K annually while providing superior functionality. Interactive dashboards enable data-driven decision-making at all levels - from individual teachers to district administrators.
dataAnalyticsDetail.feature1: Unified dashboard consolidating multiple data sources
dataAnalyticsDetail.feature2: Real-time student performance tracking and alerts
dataAnalyticsDetail.feature4: Teacher productivity and professional development insights
dataAnalyticsDetail.feature5: Predictive analytics for student success interventions
dataAnalyticsDetail.result1: Saving $800K annually in analytics tool costs
dataAnalyticsDetail.result3: Providing real-time insights with <1 second latency
dataAnalyticsDetail.result4: Enabled data-driven decisions improving outcomes by 25%

teacherToolsDetail.description:
Built an AI-powered platform that serves as a comprehensive assistant for teachers, automating administrative tasks and providing intelligent recommendations to improve classroom management and student outcomes.

The platform uses AI to generate personalized lesson plans, track student progress automatically, identify students who need intervention, and handle routine administrative work. This allows teachers to spend more time on what matters most - teaching and connecting with students.
teacherToolsDetail.feature1: AI-generated personalized lesson plans and materials
teacherToolsDetail.feature2: Automated student progress tracking and reporting
teacherToolsDetail.feature3: Smart intervention recommendations for struggling students
teacherToolsDetail.result2: Saved teachers 40% time on administrative tasks
teacherToolsDetail.result4: Improved student intervention response time by 60%
